shu: its an odd one. v8 seems to have a RegExpCodeCreateEvent for logging that just never gets triggered no matter what `--trace-` or `--log-` flags I supply :/ Was trying to isolate a performance issue in the TypeScript compiler that turned out to be a poorly performing regexp, but everything was mapped to `tsc.js:1:1`
content.formatted_body: shu: its an odd one. v8 seems to have a RegExpCodeCreateEvent for logging that just never gets triggered no matter what --trace- or --log- flags I supply :/ Was trying to isolate a performance issue in the TypeScript compiler that turned out to be a poorly performing regexp, but everything was mapped to tsc.js:1:1
